hadiths.text: Masruq narrated that :he asked Aishah about the Witr of the Prophet. She said: "He would perform Witr during all of the night; (either) its beginning, its middle, or its end. So when he died, his Witr ended, during the approachof As-Sahar

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ مِنْ أَوَّلِ اللَّيْلِ وَآخِرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Witr During The Beginning Of The Night And Its End
